titleStmt.title: A letter vnto them of the Romish Church, by Peter du Moulin, minister in the reformed Church at Paris. Together with a true iubile or generall pardon of indulgence by the same author
titleStmt.author: Du Moulin, Pierre, 1568-1658.
Goring, Richard.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by H. L[ownes] for Mathew Lownes, dwelling in Paules Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: "The great iubile and pardon of full remission for all true Christians" has caption on D7v.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
